# RMST-Survival Analysis part 4 / Indian Journal of Thoracic and Cardiovascular Surgery

`r badger::badge_custom("Louis Stokes Cleveland VA Medical Center","Cleveland VA CV Research Group","yellow")`

This repository contains a dataset and both Rscript and .do files to analyse the dataaset. These files provide examples of calculating median survival time, RMST, RMLT and other model-free non-parametric values for a time-to-event analysis.
